lead_paragraph: In pursuance of an act of the Legislature a work under this title has been prepared by Samuel S. Rental, Esq., Deputy Superintendent of Common Schools, which is now in press and will shortly he given to the public. It comprises the general laws of the State in relation to Common Schools, with full expositions, instructions and forms for the use of school officers and the people;

headline.main: The Common School System of the State of New-York.
